https://aldeia-djembe-camp.com/en.text: Every Year in September at the Aldeia Ruiva Camping
A week full of workshops dedicated to West African music and dance, delicious food and lots of activities, immersed in the idyllic nature that surrounds Aldeia Ruiva.
9 hours of training. From Intermediate to Masterclass, taught by amazing Djembefolas.
12 hours of training. Open level. West African dance and beyond!
6 hours of training. Two levels: beginners and intermediate/advanced.
The bungalows at Aldeia Ruiva have 1 family room (1 double bed + 1 bunk bed), 1 double room (double bed), a bathroom and an equipped kitchen. Ideal for groups (max. 5 people) or families.
Ample space with trees to set up tents and an area reserved for vans and caravans with direct access to the campsite, toilets and showers with hot water.
Our kitchen prepares three meals a day, with a vegetarian option always available. For vegan options or any other dietary need, just get in touch. We can accommodate any type of request!
My debut couldn't have been better! It was wonderful, I met incredible people, super hyper mega talented artists. And with the right to a big birthday party. Thank you ADC! (Michele C.)

"Thank you friends for this great gift you have given us. Wonderful organization and teachers, delicious food, great family of friends and spectacular place. I miss you all very much. See you next year! Congratulations!!! Muito obrigada! (Susi A.)
Obrigado, gracias, merci, inuwali, anitche!!! ADC family you guys are awesome! (Miguel R.)
There are no words to thank the affection, professionalism, passion and friendship ‚ô•Ô∏èü™ò‚ô•Ô∏è It was spectacular!!! Mariana H.)

The camp is located in the center of Portugal, both Porto and Lisbon airports are good options
By car via IC8 (exit at Isna de S. Carlos)

https://aldeia-djembe-camp.com/en/regist.text: This year we decided to improve the registration process for our event. Instead of email correspondence, we decided to centralise everything in a form that gives you all the information you need about prices and payment. Your information is securely stored in a database to which only the ADC team has access.

In order to reduce the costs of maintaining and programming a form tailored to the event, we decided not to implement direct payment via MBway, Paypal and others. We therefore urge everyone to pay by bank transfer to the IBAN stipulated on the form. Transfers between EU accounts are free.

To confirm your booking, you need to leave a deposit of 100‚Ç¨. If you have booked a bungalow, you must also deposit this amount to guarantee your booking. In other words: 100‚Ç¨ deposit plus the cost of bungalow accommodation, if applicable. The rest must be paid in cash at the venue.
To confirm your enrolment you will need to
Make a deposit of 100‚Ç¨ (plus the cost of bungalow accommodation, if applicable).
Send proof of payment to our email address.
